data.name: Let's Create! Pottery VR
data.detailed_description:
Let’s Create! Pottery - highly acclaimed creative app enters Virtual Reality. Creating ceramics has never been so simple, fun and clean. Unleash your artistic soul in this highly relaxing pottery game.

Shape your pot using intuitive and natural gestures in VR. Attach handles and decorate it with ornate details. Paint your pottery piece with base colors and a wide selection of patterns from variety of cultures and artistic styles.

Build your skills by completing a series of quests. Share your unique designs with your friends and family. Take a break from everyday stress and enjoy this zen-like experience of artistic fulfilment.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Let’s Create! Pottery is a relaxing game, in which you can create and decorate stunning pieces of pottery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4570 / AMD FX 8320 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon™ R9 280 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
